text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of parallelogram JKLM.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of parallelogram JKLM.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line EJ is 6 units.
The length of the line LK is 7.2 units.
The length of the line ML is 4 units.
Point E lies on the line connecting M and L.
The line JE is perpendicular to the line EL.
line_instances: There are lines LK, ML, MJ, and JK, forming parallelogram JKLM.
The lines EJ and EL are perpendicular to each other.
